Paragraph: The material properties of PQCDTB and PC61BM were analyzed. The hardness of PQCDTB was measured to be 6.5 on the Rockwell scale, while the hardness of PC61BM was measured to be 7.2 on the Rockwell scale. The density of PQCDTB was measured to be 2.7 g/cm^3, while the density of PC61BM was measured to be 3.1 g/cm^3.

In this paragraph, the relevant "Value of Material Property" entities are:

* Hardness of PQCDTB: 6.5 (Rockwell scale)
* Hardness of PC61BM: 7.2 (Rockwell scale)
* Density of PQCDTB: 2.7 g/cm^3
* Density of PC61BM: 3.1 g/cm^3

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "PQCDTB" and "PC61BM", are not "Value of Material Property" entities, as they do not refer to specific values of material properties.
